prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered kneeling pose pouring geometric patterns like starlight, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted prismatic geometric head with unique hexagonal structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying structure. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal, geodesic patterns, styled with Throne influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Azure and neutral grey inspired by wisdom structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and hexagonal emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like cup of understanding with triangular geometric patterns with structure spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor CALZIRG's profile: 'She who is in the firmament', Aethyr LIN, Earth element, Tarot The Star, Sephirot Binah, Zodiac Aquarius, embodying the essence: 'As CALZIRG approaches, the horizon stretches skyward an expansive, lofty feeling as if the very heavens have descended to meet the earth.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered kneeling pose pouring geometric patterns like starlight
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted prismatic geometric head with unique hexagonal structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with multi-faceted facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying structure
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal, geodesic patterns, styled with Throne influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: cup of understanding with triangular geometric patterns
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'She who is in the firmament'
profile_data.essence: As CALZIRG approaches, the horizon stretches skyward an expansive, lofty feeling as if the very heavens have descended to meet the earth.
profile_data.angelic_role: Throne of Firmament of Grace; marshals mountain wardens.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-faceted prismatic form embodying the mountain warden archetype, with geometric planes that shift between solid and translucent states, representing the liminal boundary between earth's material realm and celestial consciousness
profile_data.color_reasoning: Azure represents Binah's contemplative wisdom, silver-gray channels earth's elemental strength, reflecting Aquarian visionary qualities and the crystalline nature of LIN Aethyr
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structure represents sacred geometric harmony, fractals demonstrate infinite complexity, embodying divine mathematical principles
